intro: Hey, I'm Lucas. I've been building things on the web for 15 years, currently working as a Senior Frontend Engineer. But there's more to me than code - I write about technology and life, geek out about music on my YouTube channel, and I'm always reading something interesting. Welcome to my corner of the internet.

now.workingOn: Building a proprietary insurance platform dashboard at Property Insurance MGU, focusing on creating intuitive workflows for the full insurance lifecycle. I'm also working on the MyScrobble.fm project revamp. Now I feel like I have the tools to finally build the features I have always dreamed of. Really excited to ship it real soon! Stay tuned!
now.listening: Gorija has been playing on repeat lately. Can't get enough of their sound!
now.thinkingAbout: I've been thinking about our role as engineers in the Era of AI. How do we adapt and thrive as AI tools become more integrated into our workflows?

reading.title: A Máquina do Caos
reading.author: Max Fisher
reading.thoughts: Max writes using a technique that if you don't have a good attention span, you might get lost. But his insights on media manipulation are eye-opening.

reading.title: O Velho e O Mar
reading.author: Ernest Hemingway
reading.thoughts: Reading alongside 'A Máquina do Caos' has been a refreshing change of pace. Hemingway's concise prose is a joy to read.

reading.title: Ímola 1994
reading.author: Flavio Gomes
reading.thoughts: What an incredible story about Ayrton Senna and the tragic weekend at Imola. Flavio captures the tension and emotion perfectly.
